Yeah, later ill link a gov study but essentially, unlike normal psychedelics, deliriants (like prometh) deplete your choline in small amounts (the normal recommended, non trippy amounts). And when u take too much, it depletes your choline too much and causes anticholergenic toxicity (brain damage). This makes you hallucinate and have those other side effects. A lack of choline is usually a naturally occurring thing in dudes w Alzheimer‚Äôs... plus a lot of people have lasting memory and thinking issues after this stuff.
